body_html:
On the other hand, since...

yes "" | ./configure

... is run by the above script, it kinda just skips through all of the prompts. I think a potential solution to this is to make a much friendly way for scripts to run configure.py. Such just add actual python args to the script instead of just setting env variables and then skipping over user prompts lol

body:
On the other hand, since...

yes "" | ./configure

... is run by the above script, it kinda just skips through all of the prompts. I think a potential solution to this is to make a much friendly way for scripts to run configure.py. Such just add actual python args to the script instead of just setting env variables and then skipping over user prompts lol
